name: Dread Keep
description:
Traverse the shortlived horrors and despair of Dread Keep.

Gamepad recommended. Windows version recommended.


Created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 31

Gamepad:
Joystick/Dpad - Move
A - Jump, Double Jump
X - Attack
Up/RB - Enter Door


Keyboard:
A/D = Move
J - Attack
K - Jump
W - enter doors

Post-compo only:
Up+Atk - Throw
LB/Q - Switch weapons

Programming/Art: Kyle Parsons
Music/Art: Joel Miller Tansley
